--- title: Shasta Sketchers description: --Monthly Drink and Draw author: RJ Cody Markelz date: 2022-09-01 categories: [art, sketching, adventure, beer, bikes, mount shasta, shastasketchers, community] image: /images/ShastasketchersDrinkAndDrawFinal.png --- I have been meeting up with [Dustin Bonivert](https://dustinbonivert.com/) at least once a week to do some live sketching, chat about art process, and taste some micro-brews. We decided to make our meet-ups a community event once a month hosted at a few businesses in town that sell craft beer. To find out more about upcoming events please visit our group at [Shasta Sketchers](https://www.shastasketchers.com/). If you like my sketches you can check out the [sketchbook section](https://www.codymarkelz.art/sketchbook) of my art [portfolio website](https://www.codymarkelz.art/) or follow me on instagram [codymarkelz](https://www.instagram.com/codymarkelz/). I put together a flier based on some of the live sketches I did at these businesses.

Here are some other sketches I made on-sight at [Deadwood Supply Co.](https://www.deadwoodsupply.com/).
